title: COVID-19 Is A Pandemic. What Does That Mean? - HuffPost Canada

content: The World Health Organization WHO has applied the official label of pandemic to COVID the disease caused by the novel coronavirus The virus which originated in Wuhan China has infected more than people worldwide and killed more than chars
